verses.verse: בְּצֵ֣את <WH3318> went out יִ֭שְׂרָאֵל <WH3478> When Israel מִמִּצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> of Egypt בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> the house יַ֝עֲקֹ֗ב <WH3290> of Jacob מֵעַ֥ם <WH5971> from a people לֹעֵֽז׃ <WH3937> of strange language
הָיְתָ֣ה <WH1961> became יְהוּדָ֣ה <WH3063> Judah לְקָדְשׁ֑וֹ <WH6944> was his sanctuary יִ֝שְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> [and] Israel מַמְשְׁלוֹתָֽיו׃ <WH4475> his dominion
הַיָּ֣ם <WH3220> The sea רָ֭אָה <WH7200> saw וַיָּנֹ֑ס <WH5127> [it] and fled הַ֝יַּרְדֵּ֗ן <WH3383> Jordan יִסֹּ֥ב <WH5437> was driven לְאָחֽוֹר׃ <WH268> back
הֶֽ֭הָרִים <WH2022> The mountains רָקְד֣וּ <WH7540> skipped כְאֵילִ֑ים <WH352> like rams גְּ֝בָע֗וֹת <WH1389> [and] the little hills כִּבְנֵי־ <WH1121> afflicted צֹֽאן׃ <WH6629> cattle

מַה־ <WH4100> What לְּךָ֣ הַ֭יָּם <WH3220> What [ailed] thee O thou sea כִּ֣י <WH3588> for תָנ֑וּס <WH5127> that thou fleddest הַ֝יַּרְדֵּ֗ן <WH3383> ? thou Jordan תִּסֹּ֥ב <WH5437> [that] thou wast driven לְאָחֽוֹר׃ <WH268> O
הֶֽ֭הָרִים <WH2022> Ye mountains תִּרְקְד֣וּ <WH7540> [that] ye skipped כְאֵילִ֑ים <WH352> like rams גְּ֝בָע֗וֹת <WH1389> [and] ye little hills כִּבְנֵי־ <WH1121> afflicted צֹֽאן׃ <WH6629> cattle

מִלִּפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> at the presence אָ֭דוֹן <WH113> of the Lord ח֣וּלִי <WH2342> Tremble אָ֑רֶץ <WH776> thou earth מִ֝לִּפְנֵ֗י <WH6440> at the presence אֱל֣וֹהַּ <WH433> of the God יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <WH3290> of Jacob

הַהֹפְכִ֣י <WH2015> Which turned הַצּ֣וּר <WH6697> the rock אֲגַם־ <WH98> [into] a standing מָ֑יִם <WH4325> water חַ֝לָּמִ֗ישׁ <WH2496> the flint לְמַעְיְנוֹ־ <WH4599> into a fountain מָֽיִם׃ <WH4325> of waters
